name: Aureli

dialogue.text: Theres no Checkpoint Round 2 for this..
If you lose, you'll have to relearn AP Calculus all over again!

banter: If you ever find Abhiram, know that there's a bounty for him in our classroom (joke).
I'm very smart, I even graduated from High School early, don't expect a free win.
Do you really think you can defeat your own Calculus teacher?
wrong: I almost feel bad for giving you a chance. But I don't!
